INVOKE.COMMENT: Body Part Content 구하기 ==> File Content
Alert Msg Set, Source 페이지로 Redirect 하도록 한다

Values.value: <html> <body> <form name="dform" action="/JSocketAdapter/utility-fileupload.dsp" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="todo" value="search"> <input type="hidden" name="alertMsg" value="%alertMsg%"> <input type="hidden" name="uploadPath" value="%uploadPath%"> </form> <script langauge='javascript'> document.dform.submit(); </script> </body> </html>
